shopifyProduct.title: 1" Food Grade PVC Hose (30 Metre)
shopifyProduct.description: Food Grade PVC Hose Description A high performance, multipurpose, food quality, braided PVC hose. PVC Hose Applications Suitable for a multitude of applications such as; supplying compressed air, conveying industrial gases, transfering foodstuffs, transporting chemical products and water delivery. PVC Hose Construction Liner Smooth, transparent, Class A, flexible PVC. Reinforcement/s Polyster fibre braid. Cover Smooth, transparent, Class A, flexible PVC
shopifyProduct.descriptionHtml:
Food Grade PVC Hose Description

A high performance, multipurpose, food quality, braided PVC hose.

PVC Hose Applications

Suitable for a multitude of applications such as; supplying compressed air, conveying industrial gases, transfering foodstuffs, transporting chemical products and water delivery.

PVC Hose Construction

Liner Smooth, transparent, Class A, flexible PVC. Reinforcement/s Polyster fibre braid. Cover Smooth, transparent, Class A, flexible PVC
